name: Fort
description: A military fort provides strong defense and security for the surrounding area, but the martial atmosphere creates tension with civilians. The military presence offers protection and employment, while the strict discipline and regulations can be oppressive or reassuring depending on perspective.
atmosphere: Stone walls enclose parade grounds where soldiers drill in formation while officers bark commands. The air carries leather, steel, and weapon oil. Guard towers overlook strategic positions as armories and barracks house military equipment. Regimental banners fly from flagpoles.
